content: X-G FP7 Threaded studs Ultimate-performance threaded stud for use with the GX 120 gas nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick and easy solution for threaded connections Threaded stud engineered for a higher stick rate in steel, soft concrete and some tough concrete Long, conical tip and high hardness – for excellent fastening quality Applications Threaded connections with low loads ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Steel, Concrete (tough) | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Point type | Long conical tip | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 3448597 - Kit XG-W6-12-27 concrete/block + GC 22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 750x Threaded stud XG-W6 12 27 FP7 - 1x Gas canister GC 22
